title: Glo / APP
subtitle: Glo
header: Glo is the one and only place for true cosmetics and beauty fans.
Share your looks with great selfies, discover the products your friends and the best influencers use, leave ratings and reviews, find out what similar people do with the best brands all in one app!

content.header: Mobile app that strives to be the one and only place for true beauty fans.
paragraphs: I was tasked with creating the entire UI/UX of this amazing product focused on millennials, who are obsessed with the way they look.

content.header: Instagram like photo editing mode allows you to modify your photo before you post.
paragraphs: Interface interactions were a big part of the project. The goal was to make them both seamless and fun for the audience to play with and stay engaged.
